statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.BrandName, CC.ChannelName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, BB.BrandName , CC.ChannelName
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BTOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.OrderDate >= #StartDate# AND AA.OrderDate <= #EndDate#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, BB.BrandName , CC.ChannelName
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BTOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BTOrderSum ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, BrandID, ChannelID, OrderDate, OrderQty, OrderAmt ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #BrandID#, #ChannelID#, #OrderDate#, #OrderQty#, #OrderAmt# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BTOrderSum SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, BrandID = #BrandID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , OrderDate = #OrderDate# , OrderQty = #OrderQty# , OrderAmt = #OrderAmt# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.BrandName) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreateDate , BB.CreateBy , BB.CreateByName , BB.UpdateDate , BB.UpdateBy , BB.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , CC.BrandName , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , BB.OrderDate , ISNULL(BB.OrderQty, 0) as OrderQty , ISNULL(BB.OrderAmt, 0) as OrderAmt
FROM ( SELECT AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.StartDate <= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) AND ISNULL(AA.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112))) >= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) ) AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ID , CreateDate , CreateBy , CreateByName , UpdateDate , UpdateBy , UpdateByName , ChannelID , BrandID , OrderDate , OrderQty , OrderAmt FROM dbo.BTOrderSum WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND OrderDate = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) ) BB ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ChannelID AND AA.BrandID = BB.BrandID LEFT JOIN dbo.BMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BTOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.OrderDate = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112)
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.BTOrderSum WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND OrderDate = #OrderDate#
DELETE FROM dbo.BTOrderSum WHERE BrandID = #BrandID# AND OrderDate = #OrderDate#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.ChannelName, BB.BrandName, AA.ChannelMargin, AA.BrandMargin) as RowNo
, AA.ChannelID , CC.ChannelName , E2.EmployeeName as ChannelManager
, AA.BrandID , BB.BrandName , E1.EmployeeName as BrandManager
, AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, AA.ChannelMargin , AA.OrderAmt * AA.ChannelMargin/100.0 as ChannelAccAmt
, (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin) as BrandMargin , AA.OrderAmt * (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin)/100.0 as BrandAccAmt
, AA.BrandMargin - AA.ChannelMargin as SaleMargin , AA.OrderAmt - AA.OrderAmt * AA.ChannelMargin/100.0 - AA.OrderAmt * (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin)/100.0 as SaleAmt
FROM ( SELECT AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , CB.ChannelMargin , CB.BrandMargin , SUM(AA.OrderQty) as OrderQty , SUM(AA.OrderAmt) as OrderAmt FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BTOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMChannelBrand CB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CB.ChannelID AND AA.BrandID = CB.BrandID AND CB.StartDate <= AA.OrderDate AND ISNULL(CB.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, AA.OrderDate)) >= AA.OrderDate WHERE AA.OrderDate >= #StartDate# AND AA.OrderDate <= #EndDate#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
GROUP BY AA.ChannelID, AA.BrandID, CB.ChannelMargin, CB.BrandMargin ) AA LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMBrandManager B1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = B1.BrandID AND B1.StartDate <= #EndDate# AND ISNULL(B1.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)) >= #EndDate# LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BCEmployee E1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON B1.EmployeeID = E1.ID LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMChannelManager C1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = C1.ChannelID AND C1.StartDate <= #EndDate# AND ISNULL(C1.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)) >= #EndDate# LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BCEmployee E2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON C1.EmployeeID = E2.ID ORDER BY RowNo
